Configuration.startupClientLisp: (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CogbotRadegastPluginModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load AIMLBotModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load TheSimiansModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load IrcRegionModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "login") ;; does the login (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster Douglas Miles") ;; change this to your name ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread irc #logicmoo cogbotIRCModule666 irc.freenode.net") ;; to connect to IRC ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml on") ;; turns on aiml for all users
